quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways has launched the curtain raiser of Global Maritime India Summit (GIMS), 2023 (third edition) in Mumbai. The summit is slated for 17th to 19th October 2023, at __________, with ________ as the exclusive industry partner.
options: Mumbai; NASSCOM
New Delhi; ASSOCHAM
New Delhi; CII
Mumbai; FICCI
New Delhi; FICCI

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), NITI Aayog has released the India Climate Energy Dashboard (ICED) 3.0. The dashboard offers more than ________ parameters.
options: 150
75
500
100
200

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, heat index is derived using the heat index equation similar to what is used by ____________________.
options: National Aeronautics and Space Administration
National Weather Service, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), USA
Indian Space Research Organisatio
Indian Institute of Technology, Madras
2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to color codes of Experimental Heat Index?
options: Red Color: EHI greater than 45 deg C
Orange Color: EHI in the range of 36-45 deg C
Yellow Color: EHI in the range of 36-45 deg C
Green Color: EHI less than 45 deg C
None of the above

quiz.text: According to the recent data released by the Ministry of New & Renewable Energy (RE), a total of ________ renewable energy capacity has been installed in India as on 30.06.2023.
options: 216.49 GW
146.49 GW
136.49 GW
156.49 GW
176.49 GW

quiz.text:
Recently (July 2023), the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MoSPI) has constituted Standing Committee on Statistics (SCoS). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to SCoS?

1. SCoS has replaced the Standing Committee on Economic Statistics (SCES).

2. Pronab Sen, India’s first chief statistician and the former chairman of the National Statistical Commission (NSC) is the chair of SCoS.

3. It has a mandate to review the framework and results of all surveys conducted under the aegis of the National Statistical Office.
options: 1 and 2
2 and 3
1, 2 and 3
1 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to E-Shram Portal?1.      Its objective is to create a comprehensive National Database of Organized Workers, seeded with Aadhaar.2.      It covers gig and platform workers only.3.      E-shram portal has a target of registering 25 crore workers till 2024-25.
options: 1 and 2
2 and 3
1 and 3
None of the above
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC)?1.      It is an initiative of Ministry of Finance.2.      ONDC Registry acts as a phonebook to find other ONDC protocol-compliant platforms.3.      Its objectives are increased choices and independency for consumers.
options: 2 and 3
2 only
1 and 3
None of the above
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following activities/programmes is/are undertaken by Legal Services Authorities?1.      Legal aid and advice2.      Legal awareness programmes3.      Legal services/empowerment camps4.      Legal services clinics
options: 2, 3 and 4
1, 2 and 3
1 and 3
All of the above
None of the above

India

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), the Global Food Regulators Summit 2023 is being organized by ___________.
options: National Institute of Health and Family Welfare
Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI)
International Institute for Population Sciences

quiz.text:
Which of the following initiatives launched during the G20 Global Food Regulators Summit is/are correctly matched?

1.

Food-o-Copoeia

 

It is a comprehensive database of Food Regulatory Authorities from 76 countries.

2.

'SaNGRAH'                  

It is a comprehensive collection of food category-wise monographs.

3.

Common Digital Dashboard

It is a unified IT portal providing comprehensive information on standards, regulations, notifications, advisories, guidelines, contamination limits, and the latest developments by Food Regulators in India.
options: 1 and 2
2 and 3
1 and 3
3 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following countries is/are the guest countries in G20 2023 under India’s presidency?1.      Bangladesh2.      Denmark3.      Spain4.      Oman5.      Sri Lanka
options: 1, 2 and 3
1, 3 and 4
2, 4 and 5
2, 3, 4 and 5
All of the above

1924

1974

25%

quiz.text: Recently (July 2023), Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) Science & Technology announced that India has developed the world's latest Steel Road technology. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Steel Slag Road Technology?1.      Technology has been developed by CSIR- Central Road Research Institute (CRRI), New Delhi.2.      First city in the country to get a processed steel slag (industrial waste) road was Surat, Gujarat.3.      Steel slag roads costs 30% cheaper and lasts three times longer.
options: 1 and 3
2 and 3
1 and 2
None of the above
1, 2 and 3
